description: This file declares functions for initializing and retrieving a transcoder related to automation services within the zilker SDK. It includes header guards, licensing information, and references an external library for transcoding operations.

methods.name: automationTranscoderInit
methods.description: Initializes the transcoder for rules engines to Sheens rules.

methods.name: automationServiceGetTranscoder
methods.description: Returns a pointer to a transcoder object based on the provided specification.
